Author: starsgirl9
Text: I can relate hard. I’ve been deep into my ed for quite some time now to where i can easily spot an ed when i see it, and i’ve been noticing it on my sister. She has a calorie counting app, pretends she’s full when eating a few bites of chocolate, tries counting her steps, etc.. I won’t deny the fact that i was probably her inspiration, but I don’t know what to do and my mom won’t take it seriously. I fear she will go down that road, and once you dive in we ALL know you can’t get out. Let’s just hope they don’t fall into what we are going through now.
